entries.name: count
entries.desc: The number of progress items counted so far.

entries.name: new(out_stream, size, initial_message, terminal_message = 'complete')
entries.desc: Creates a new progress reporter that will write to out_stream for size items.  Shows the given initial_message when progress starts and the terminal_message when it is complete.

entries.name: updated(message)
entries.desc: Prints out the position relative to the total and the message.
